sourcesContent:
My Heroes

  • {{hero.id}} {{hero.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Hero } from '../hero'; import { HeroService } from '../hero.service'; import { MessageService } from '../message.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes', templateUrl: './heroes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./heroes.component.css'] }) export class HeroesComponent implements OnInit { heroes: Hero[] = []; constructor(private heroService: HeroService, private messageService: MessageService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getHeroes(); } getHeroes(): void { this.heroService.getHeroes() .subscribe(heroes => this.heroes = heroes); } }
